promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple fish water-type pokemon with golden scales. It can be found in lake-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or fish. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldabble, a a chibi cute simple fish water-type pokemon. It can be found in lake-like environments It has the following abilities: Octazooka. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "fish", "water" or "Goldabble". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, fish-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, gleaming bubble background
generatedDescription: This charming fin-lord dwells in serene aquatic domains, flaunting its golden sheen. Known for its Octazooka, it playfully sprays passersby.
